DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue , blood , saliva patient cancer study laboratory may help study cancer future . PURPOSE : This laboratory study collect store tissue sample patient head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Collecting Storing Tissue Samples From Patients With Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Establish tissue/specimen bank biologic specimen collect patient proven suspect head neck cancer . - Establish database link material acquisition pathologic clinical information patient . - Correlate clinical-pathological finding patient future scientific study use patient database . - Test new hypothesis emerge . OUTLINE : This prospective , multicenter study . Patients enrol active Radiation Therapy Oncology Group clinical trial undergo biopsy surgical resection head neck tumor premalignant lesion participate institution . Tissue specimen collect time biopsy surgery submit Head Neck Cancer Tissue/Specimen Bank act central repository processing , store , preserve patient specimens translational research . Tissue sample include paraffin-embedded block fresh frozen sample normal squamous mucosa , tumor , premalignant lesion upper aerodigestive tract . Other specimens tissue bank include serum , plasma , lymphocytes isolated peripheral blood , well sample patient saliva . Cells obtain tissue bank specimen may also use establish cell line future research . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : An unlimited number specimen accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Confirmed suspect head neck cancer Primary site recurrence allow Potentially eligible participate active Radiation Therapy Oncology Group treatment clinical trial PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Zubrod performance status 01 PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics Concurrent radiotherapy , drug therapy , biopsy , surgery allow
